a-modal/afterClose.description: Specify a function that will be called when modal is closed completely.

a-modal/bodyStyle.description: Body style for modal body element. Such as height, padding etc.

a-modal/closable.description: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the modal dialog or not

a-modal/confirmLoading.description: Whether to apply loading visual effect for OK button or not

a-modal/destroyOnClose.description: Whether to unmount child components on onClose

a-modal/footer.description: Footer content, set as :footer="null" when you don't need default buttons

a-modal/getContainer.description: Return the mount node for Modal

a-modal/maskClosable.description: Whether to close the modal dialog when the mask (area outside the modal) is clicked

a-modal/okType.description: Button type of the OK button

a-modal/okButtonProps.description: The ok button props, follow jsx rules

a-modal/cancelButtonProps.description: The cancel button props, follow jsx rules

a-modal/visible.description: Whether the modal dialog is visible or not

a-modal/wrapClassName.description: The class name of the container of the modal dialog
